Primary Contact: Colleen Cornock, Crime Prevention Supervisor, Kelowna RCMP; Email: colleen.cornock@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
Service Details: - Contacts senior briefly by telephone at a predetermined time each day (usually between 9:00am - 11:00am) and verifies their safety status- If contact attempts are unsuccessful one of the emergency contact individuals is contacted
Eligibility: - Persons living alone who DO NOT have a caregiver, homemaker, etc. checking or visiting on a regular basis- Must have two emergency contact persons living with in the City of Kelowna
How to Apply: - Persons who have been referred for this program will be interviewed by the staff or volunteers to determine suitability- Accepted applicants will be required to complete and sign the application/release form- Referrals for this program will be taken from agencies and organizations working with seniors or from individuals who are aware of seniors who live alone and could benefit from this program.
Address & Map: 1450 KLO Rd, #100Kelowna, BC     V1W 3Z4View MapQuest Map
